printed_text: When you win a game with Evidence Collection in your score area, reveal set 2.
stripped_printed_text: When you win a game with Evidence Collection in your score area, reveal set 2.

printed_text: When you win a game with Evidence Collection in your score area, reveal set 5.
stripped_printed_text: When you win a game with Evidence Collection in your score area, reveal set 5.

printed_text: When you win a game with Evidence Collection in your score area, reveal set 8.
stripped_printed_text: When you win a game with Evidence Collection in your score area, reveal set 8.

printed_text: Evidence Collection is worth 1 fewer agenda point while in the Runner's score area.
stripped_printed_text: Evidence Collection is worth 1 fewer agenda point while in the Runner's score area.

printed_text: Whenever you score an agenda, you may swap it with an agenda in the Runner's score area worth at least 1 point, then resolve the "when scored" ability on that agenda.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you score an agenda, you may swap it with an agenda in the Runner's score area worth at least 1 point, then resolve the "when scored" ability on that agenda.

printed_text: Whenever the Runner steals an agenda, you may resolve the "when scored" ability on that agenda, then swap it with an agenda in your scored area.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Runner steals an agenda, you may resolve the "when scored" ability on that agenda, then swap it with an agenda in your scored area.

printed_text: Whenever you rez a piece of ice, give the Runner 1 tag.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you rez a piece of ice, give the Runner 1 tag.

printed_text:
Whenever you rez a piece of ice, give the Runner 1 tag.
Whenever the Runner accesses cards, he or she accesses 1 fewer card if he or she is tagged (to a minimum of 1 card).
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you rez a piece of ice, give the Runner 1 tag. Whenever the Runner accesses cards, he or she accesses 1 fewer card if he or she is tagged (to a minimum of 1 card).

printed_text:
If Trojan is accessed from R&D, then Runner must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses Trojan, lose 2[credit], trash 1 card from HQ at random, and destroy Trojan. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Trojan from Archives.
stripped_printed_text: If Trojan is accessed from R&D, then Runner must reveal it. When the Runner accesses Trojan, lose 2 credits, trash 1 card from HQ at random, and destroy Trojan. Ignore this ability if the Runner accesses Trojan from Archives.

printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The Runner must pay 2[credit] as an additional cost to use an icebreaker.
stripped_printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The Runner must pay 2 credits as an additional cost to use an icebreaker.

printed_text:
[subroutine] Trash 1 program.
[subroutine] Trash 1 program.
[subroutine] Trash 1 piece of hardware.
[subroutine] The Runner loses 3[credit], if able. End the run.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine Trash 1 program. Subroutine Trash 1 program. Subroutine Trash 1 piece of hardware. Subroutine The Runner loses 3 credits, if able. End the run.

printed_text:
[subroutine] Trash 1 resource.
[subroutine] Trash 1 resource.
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage.
[subroutine] The Runner loses [click], if able. End the run.
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine Trash 1 resource. Subroutine Trash 1 resource. Subroutine Do 1 net damage. Subroutine The Runner loses click, if able. End the run.

printed_text:
When you score Corporate Oversight, you may search R&D for a piece of ice. Install and rez it protecting a remote server, ignoring all costs. Shuffle R&D.
If you win a game with Corporate Oversight in your score area, destroy it.
stripped_printed_text: When you score Corporate Oversight, you may search R&D for a piece of ice. Install and rez it protecting a remote server, ignoring all costs. Shuffle R&D. If you win a game with Corporate Oversight in your score area, destroy it.

printed_text:
When you score Corporate Oversight, you may search R&D for a piece of ice. Install and rez it protecting a central server, ignoring all costs. Shuffle R&D.
If you win a game with Corporate Oversight in your score area, destroy it.
stripped_printed_text: When you score Corporate Oversight, you may search R&D for a piece of ice. Install and rez it protecting a central server, ignoring all costs. Shuffle R&D. If you win a game with Corporate Oversight in your score area, destroy it.

printed_text: When you win a game with Investigator Inez Delgado in your score area, reveal set 2. Add Investigator Inez Delgado to your score area as an agenda worth 0 agenda points: Expose all cards in a remote server. Use this only if you have stolean an agenda this turn.
stripped_printed_text: When you win a game with Investigator Inez Delgado in your score area, reveal set 2. Add Investigator Inez Delgado to your score area as an agenda worth 0 agenda points: Expose all cards in a remote server. Use this only if you have stolean an agenda this turn.

printed_text: When you win a game with Investigator Inez Delgado in your score area, reveal set 5. Add Investigator Inez Delgado to your score area as an agenda worth 0 agenda points: Reveal the top 3 cards in R&D. Use this only if you have stolean an agenda this turn.
stripped_printed_text: When you win a game with Investigator Inez Delgado in your score area, reveal set 5. Add Investigator Inez Delgado to your score area as an agenda worth 0 agenda points: Reveal the top 3 cards in R&D. Use this only if you have stolean an agenda this turn.

printed_text: When you win a game with Investigator Inez Delgado in your score area, reveal set 8. Add Investigator Inez Delgado to your score area as an agenda worth 0 agenda points: Reveal each card in HQ. Use this only if you have stolean an agenda this turn.
stripped_printed_text: When you win a game with Investigator Inez Delgado in your score area, reveal set 8. Add Investigator Inez Delgado to your score area as an agenda worth 0 agenda points: Reveal each card in HQ. Use this only if you have stolean an agenda this turn.

printed_text: Add Investigator Inez Delgado to your score area as an agenda worth 0 agenda points: Reveal each card in HQ and the top card of R&D. Use this only if you have stolean an agenda this turn.
stripped_printed_text: Add Investigator Inez Delgado to your score area as an agenda worth 0 agenda points: Reveal each card in HQ and the top card of R&D. Use this only if you have stolean an agenda this turn.

printed_text: Whenever the Corp spends [click] to draw 1 or more cards (including through a card ability), reveal the first card drawn.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Corp spends click to draw 1 or more cards (including through a card ability), reveal the first card drawn.

printed_text:
Whenever the Corp spends [click] to draw 1 or more cards (including through a card ability), reveal the first card drawn.
2[credits]: For the remainder of this run, access 1 additional card whenever you access cards from HQ or R&D. Use this ability only once per turn.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Corp spends click to draw 1 or more cards (including through a card ability), reveal the first card drawn. 2[credits]: For the remainder of this run, access 1 additional card whenever you access cards from HQ or R&D. Use this ability only once per turn.

printed_text:
Whenever a program is trashed from your grip, host it on BMI Buffer instead of adding it to your heap.
[click][click]: Install 1 hosted program (paying all costs).
stripped_printed_text: Whenever a program is trashed from your grip, host it on BMI Buffer instead of adding it to your heap. click click: Install 1 hosted program (paying all costs).

printed_text:
Whenever a program is trashed from your grip, host it on BMI Buffer instead of adding it to your heap.
[click][click]: Install 1 hosted program, ignoring all costs.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever a program is trashed from your grip, host it on BMI Buffer instead of adding it to your heap. click click: Install 1 hosted program, ignoring all costs.

printed_text:
Whenever you draw a Shadow Team, immediately install it.
Whenever you initiate a run, trash a card from your grip, if able. When you make a successful run on a central server, destroy Shadow Team.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you draw a Shadow Team, immediately install it. Whenever you initiate a run, trash a card from your grip, if able. When you make a successful run on a central server, destroy Shadow Team.

printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. As an additional cost to advance a card, the Corp must pay 1[credit].
stripped_printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. As an additional cost to advance a card, the Corp must pay 1 credit.

printed_text: [click],[trash]: Make a run and gain [click]. If successful, draw 1 card.
stripped_printed_text: click,trash: Make a run and gain click. If successful, draw 1 card.

printed_text: [click],[trash]: Make a run and gain [click]. If that run is successful when it ends, you may immediately make another run on another server.
stripped_printed_text: click,trash: Make a run and gain click. If that run is successful when it ends, you may immediately make another run on another server.

printed_text: [click],[click]: Make a run on a remote server. If successful, instead treat it as a successful run on a central server.
stripped_printed_text: click,click: Make a run on a remote server. If successful, instead treat it as a successful run on a central server.

printed_text: [click],[click]: Make a run on a central server. If successful, instead treat it as a successful run on a remote server.
